subject: Package Protection
msgSnippet: I have written a class.. suppose in wei.cot.rem.ppgs.xmlinfo.java and then i have a test package.. wei.cot.rem.ppgs.test.xmlInfoTest.java.. xmlInfo does not
messageBody:
I have written a class.. suppose in
wei.cot.rem.ppgs.xmlinfo.java
and then i have a test package..
wei.cot.rem.ppgs.test.xmlInfoTest.java..
xmlInfo does not have public class. It is defined like
class xmlInfo{
//
//
}.
When I try running the test, it gives me error that I cannot access
the class. I think something is related to packge protection.. I was
wondering if this problem could be solved too..
Thanks.
Abhishek
